node.title: Lady Jane in Spain: The Australian mango enjoying sweet success internationally
node.description: It was developed near Katherine in the NT, but there are now commercial plantings of this mango in Spain and trials underway in more than 10 countries.
node.content:
["A mango variety that was developed\u00a0in the Northern Territory\u00a0is now being grown and sold commercially in Spain.\u00a0", "Katherine-based mango breeder\u00a0Ken Rayner, officially launched the Lady Jane mango back in 2013.", "While a handful of growers are now busy harvesting this variety around Katherine and in Far North Queensland \u2014 it's overseas\u00a0where this beautiful mango is really taking off.", "\"There's now more commercial plantings [of this mango variety] in Spain\u00a0than there is in Australia,\" said consultant Richard Byllaardt,\u00a0a long-time friend of\u00a0Mr Rayner.", "\"The first commercial crop has been harvested this year in Spain and they're very happy with it.", "\"They don't call it Lady Jane, it's being sold under the\u00a0Ib\u00e9rica Fresh brand.\"", "", "
The mangoes in Spain are sold with a QR code, allowing consumers to scan and learn more about the variety.(Facebook:\u00a0Ib\u00e9rica Fresh)
", "Mr Byllaardt said the mangoes were\u00a0being grown in the Alicante region of Spain under protective netting.", "\"The beauty of growing mangoes in Spain, is that they're basically picked and sold within 24 hours, compared to Katherine in the NT where mangoes are picked, but take four days to get to a customer.", "
Decades in the making
", "Ken Rayner recently celebrated his 90th birthday in Katherine.", "He said it was great to see his mangoes\u00a0being accepted by other countries.", "\"It's taken the best part of 20 years to reach this point [with Lady Jane mangoes],\" he said.", "\"It's been a long, hard slog\u00a0but well worth it in the end.", "", "
Mango breeder Ken Rayner in his orchard near Katherine, NT.(Daniel Fitzgerald)
", "Mr Byllaardt said after decades of hard work, the humble Mr Rayner deserved all of the praise coming his way.", "\"I think this mango [Lady Jane]\u00a0is about to take off around the world,\" he said.", "\"These mangoes are also being trialled in South Africa, along with 14 other varieties Ken has sent them.", "\"More than\u00a010 countries around the world, such as Brazil, Israel Morocco, Egypt, USA, have all got PBR (Plant Breeders Rights]\u00a0registrations and recognised Ken's exclusive mango\u00a0and have started trials.", "Last year, Mr Rayner received\u00a0the Medal of the Order of Australia (OAM)\u00a0for his service to horticulture and decades of work cultivating new\u00a0mango varieties.\u00a0"]
